column3: cute diner style restaurant. My boyfriend started out with a "Sure is Smokey
column4: Burt!" cocktail which tasted like a straight up campfire. It was the strange yet very intriguing. The waitress was super informative with what we should order. I ordered the pulled pork sandwich
column5: which was delicious! It was a dry pulled pork but very tasty. My boyfriend got the Los Drowned sandwich and the fries. The fries were skinny
column7: and had a delicious smokey flavor which I've never experienced before. My boyfriend claims they are the best fries he's ever had! We had to force ourselves to not eat here for the second night so we could experience another food spot. We will definitely be visiting Little Goat again on our next visit!
